Prerequisite: Avenger, must worship Moradin

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Religion checks. In addition, whenever you score a critical hit, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn as a godsworn boon. You can benefit from only one godsworn boon as a result of any given critical hit.

Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 42.
